topics.title: Renewable Energy
topics.description: Discuss the future and importance of renewable energy sources.
topics.prompt: Give a short speech on why renewable energy is crucial for the future and the steps needed to increase its adoption.

topics.title: Social Media Influence
topics.description: Examine the impact of social media on society and individual behavior.
topics.prompt: Discuss how social media shapes our opinions, behaviors, and daily lives, highlighting both its positive and negative effects.

topics.title: Mental Health Awareness
topics.description: Share your views on the importance of mental health and breaking the stigma.
topics.prompt: Explain why mental health awareness is essential and suggest ways to support and promote mental well-being in communities.

topics.title: Space Exploration
topics.description: Debate the significance and future of space exploration.
topics.prompt: Discuss the benefits and challenges of space exploration and whether it should be a priority for humanity.

topics.title: Artificial Intelligence Ethics
topics.description: Discuss the ethical considerations surrounding AI development.
topics.prompt: Debate the ethical implications of artificial intelligence in various sectors, such as healthcare, employment, and privacy.

topics.title: Plant-Based Diets
topics.description: Examine the benefits and challenges of adopting plant-based diets.
topics.prompt: Discuss the health, environmental, and ethical reasons for and against plant-based diets and how they compare to traditional diets.
